alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 1:28PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern White Pine, southeastern Elko and east central Eureka Counties through 200 PM PDT... At 127 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles east of Lages Junction to 19 miles southwest of Ruby Lake. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jiggs, Currie, Ruby Lake, Lee, Lages Junction, Harrison Pass, Overland Pass, Franklin Lake and White Horse Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County
